transcript.text: Shalom Shalom Shalom I'm sitting here in
my car at PSU because it's raining
outside I just finished a a two hour
stint of street preacher at Portland
State University God got out there
little after noon and I'm pretty sure
for a good good solid two hours more
than two hours actually because it's
almost it's almost two-thirty here so I
took out my umbrella and actually I'm
now gonna have to buy a new umbrella
because my my umbrella got mangled took
my umbrella has started preaching around
noon there was hardly anyone out because
it was raining and yet as i began to
exalt the torah and Yahshua really
emphasizing the blood atonement a crowd
started to form amazingly even in the
rain and then for there's a little bit
of time of the rain stopped but one of
the reasons why a crowd developed was
there's this man named joshua and he was
a very wicked man he he professed with
his lips that he loves Christ and yet he
said that he lied every single day he
lies and very smug and arrogant attitude
very wicked and so what happened was is
that as I was exalting the true Christ
the true Yahshua one who loves ya xuan
will not send one who will truly obey
the entire Torah hat of love Rio shua
what happened was is the spirit of yah
began to just show this diametric
difference between me and this very
wicked arrogant smug hypocrite Joshua
eventually when I was preaching on
Hebrews chapter 8 and the essence of the
gospel Joshua started saying oh that's
not what it says that's not what it says
and of course then I actually opened the
Bible and read it verbatim even at that
point he's still hardened his heart and
so at that point I decided to read first
Corinthians 5 and I delivered him over
to Satan and i prophesied to him I said
that within five months your life will
be a complete wreck and he said well
give me your phone number so that I can
call you when that happens nice okay so
I gave him my phone number and then I
noticed even after I continued to preach
he would go like a snake to like
different members of my crowd and start
you know speaking wickedness to them and
but that was fine so I preached on that
and then so a lot of it was it was
dealing with and of course because he
came out a lot of people were came out
we're hypocrites and then there was also
this very proud atheist that I was
debating the Roche limit you know and
the age of the earth and evolution and
he was very wicked as well but then the
Spirit of God just let me to start
preaching out psalm 119 and I did that
and just continue to emphasize what a
true believer does that a true believer
the essence of the gospel is that you
have an inward desire to obey the Torah
and that really seemed to to quiet these
hypocrites um there are several times of
the Spirit I just overwhelmed me and I
was so grieved and I would just yell out
because of my grief at these people who
profess to love Christ and quote the
Bible and yet they don't have a clue who
Christ is because they still walk in sin
even in the midst of that though I had
several people ask for cards I mean
literally who came up to me and wanted a
card I had one lady young woman who said
look I heard you're a pastor of a
congregation I want to be a part of it
so I gave her my information she's going
to join our skype meetings so I've
already gotten a student at PSU who
wants to join our nightly Skype meetings
and there were a couple of others who
just you don't ask for a website there
was another guy I talked to that was
also interested enjoying the skype and
he grabbed my card so that was really
neat that's the first time that's
happened um and um at one point the most
controversial point was there was a
woman who was a Jew and she was trying
to quote the Bible to me and I said
where your zeit zeit where's your head
covering where you know and and and I
called her a bitch I called her a bitch
and people got really upset about that
but then I said wait a minute do you
remember when Jesus Christ called um
that came a night woman a dog you know
she said he said I've come not to to
serve the Gentile dogs i'm going to the
jews and then she rather than getting
offended she responded in humility and
said yes but jesus even the dogs can eat
the crumb the crumbs at the master's
table so she was not offended that jesus
called her a bitch and
unfortunately when I called this woman a
bit she was very offended but if she had
responded in humility she would have
been blessed um so that that caused a
lot of controversy but it's still it's
still droopy people's that the pure
hearts were not offended and there were
some pure hearts out there today I'm
really excited because I think I think
for the first time my skype gathering is
going to include students from psu
hallelujah Bell Shalom it's the it's the
second day of the week it's monday I'm
in the full-time ministry now just
trusting in yah for provision
financially and otherwise and my job
rain or shine is to come to psu each and
every day to contend for the faith and
of course we will be having a skype
meeting tonight at 6pm Pacific 9 p.m.
Eastern anyone's welcome to attend this
is daniel john lee with torah
restoration ministries the websites ww
spirit intercom Shalom from a rainy
rainy psu very rainy indeed and it's the
15th day of the eight months
